程序包 nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.persistency.writer

接口 FileWriter

所有已知实现类:
LeafWriter, XMLFileWriter
public interface FileWriter
An FileWriter interface to achieve the following abstraction. 1. save the current game map. 2. save the current game records in order for the player to resume games.
作者:
Rae 300535154

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void addActionNode​(org.dom4j.Element root, int timer, java.lang.String actor, java.lang.String dir)
    add the game actions to XML.
    void saveCurrentMap​(java.lang.String fName, App app)
    save the board of the current game.

  • 方法详细资料

    • saveCurrentMap

      void saveCurrentMap​(java.lang.String fName, App app)
      save the board of the current game.
      参数:
      fName - the output file name
      app - the current game

    • addActionNode

      void addActionNode​(org.dom4j.Element root, int timer, java.lang.String actor, java.lang.String dir)
      add the game actions to XML. This is for Recorder to write each action records to a XML file.
      参数:
      root - the root ele
      timer - current time left
      actor - current actor
      dir - direction actor moved
